events.message: Customer reported a vehicle collision that occurred on April 30, 2024, involving their sedan and another car at an intersection.
The claim was categorised under Auto Accident after verifying the description referenced a car collision and visible vehicle damage.
Assigned claims specialist Emily Rogers to handle the investigation and communication with the claimant regarding the car accident.
Sent formal acknowledgement email to the policyholder to confirm receipt of the accident claim and provide next steps.
Requested the claimant to submit the police report, photos of vehicle damage, and a copy of the repair estimate for evaluation.
Received submitted documents including detailed photos of the damaged vehicle, official police report, and vendor repair estimate.
Initiated accident claim investigation by reviewing submitted materials and contacting involved parties for additional information.
Completed review and confirmed liability with supporting documentation from police report and witness statements.
Proposed a settlement offer to cover all repair costs and related expenses based on investigation findings and vendor estimates.
Customer responded positively to the settlement offer, expressing appreciation for the timely and fair handling of the claim.
Approved the claim officially to proceed with payment following the customerâ€™s acceptance of the proposed settlement.
Issued payment to the claimant's bank account to cover approved costs related to vehicle repairs after the auto accident.
Closed the claim file after confirming payment completion and customer satisfaction with the accident claim resolution.
